title: 领域可用的服务器欢迎语命令方块实现
author: masoncha
txt_content:
本帖最后由 masoncha 于 2016-3-24 16:00 编辑 
/scoreboard objectives add oldPlayer dummy
/scoreboard objectives add QuitGame stat.leaveGame
/scoreboard objectives add loginTimes dummy
/scoreboard objectives setdisplay list loginTimes


新人登录看到的画面
/execute @a[tag=!oldPlayer] ~ ~ ~ /tellraw @p ["",{"text":">>>>>   FineCraft方块王国领域服务器   <<<<< ","color":"dark_purple","bold":true},{"text":"欢迎您！休闲生存服务\n","color":"yellow","bold":true},{"text":"","color":"white","bold":false}]
/scoreboard players add @a[tag=!oldPlayer] loginTimes 1
/scoreboard players tag @a[tag=!oldPlayer] add oldPlayer


后续登录看到的画面
/execute @a[score_QuitGame_min=1] ~ ~ ~ /tellraw @p ["",{"text":">>>>>   FineCraft方块王国领域服务器   <<<<< ","color":"dark_purple","bold":true},{"text":"\n欢迎您！休闲生存服务\n【  ","color":"dark_green","bold":true},{"selector":"@p","color":"yellow","bold":true},{"text":" 】  王者归来！","color":"dark_green","bold":false}]
/scoreboard players add @a[score_QuitGame_min=1] loginTimes 1
/scoreboard players set @a[score_QuitGame_min=1] QuitGame 0复制代码
在TAB界面可以看到玩家的登录次数。
小脚本，大家给点意见，看有没有更好的实现方式。现在是用了2组，每组3个方块。
